member.name: T:LeastViable.Solder.IoC.ActivatorDependencyResolution
member.summary: Provides the Factory Method pattern used to resolve dependencies. This implementation uses Activator.CreateInstance(...) and is the only implementation that allows for constructor auto-wiring using the DependencyInjectionAttribute.

member.summary: Provides the Factory Method pattern used to resolve dependencies.

member.summary: Resolves a dependency.

member.returns: An instance of an object or null.

member.name: T:LeastViable.Solder.IoC.DependencyManager
member.summary: Provides dependency registration and resolution services. Uses reader-writer lock for asynchronous protection (i.e. thread-safety).

member.name: T:LeastViable.Solder.IoC.IDependencyManager
member.summary: Provides dependency registration and resoltuion services.

member.summary: Adds a new dependency resolution for a given target type and selector key. Throws a DependencyException if the target type and selector key combination has been previously registered in this instance. This is the generic overload.
member.param: An non-null, zero or greater length string selector key.
The dependency resolution.

An non-null, zero or greater length string selector key.
The dependency resolution.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.IoC.IDependencyManager.ClearAllResolutions
member.summary: Clears all registered dependency resolutions from this instance.
member.returns: A value indicating if at least one dependency resolution was removed.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.IoC.IDependencyManager.ClearTypeResolutions``1
member.summary: Clears all registered dependency resolutions of the specified target type from this instance. This is the generic overload.
member.returns: A value indicating if at least one dependency resolution was removed.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.IoC.IDependencyManager.ClearTypeResolutions(System.Type)
member.summary: Clears all registered dependency resolutions of the specified target type from this instance. This is the non-generic overload.
member.param: The target type of removal.
member.returns: A value indicating if at least one dependency resolution was removed.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.IoC.IDependencyManager.HasTypeResolution``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether there are any registered dependency resolutions of the specified target type in this instance. If selector key is a null value, then this method will return true if any resolution exists for the specified target type, regardless of selector key; otherwise, this method will return true only if a resolution exists for the specified target type and selector key. This is the generic overload.
member.param: An null or zero or greater length string selector key.
member.typeparam: The target type of the check.
member.returns: A value indicating if at least one dependency resolution is present.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.IoC.IDependencyManager.HasTypeResolution(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether there are any registered dependency resolutions of the specified target type in this instance. This is the non-generic overload.
member.param: The target type of the check.
An null or zero or greater length string selector key.
member.returns: A value indicating if at least one dependency resolution is present.

An non-null, zero or greater length string selector key.

member.summary: Marks an assembly as containing one or more types containing dependency registration methods. Marks a class type as containing one or more dependency registration methods. member.summary: Provides the Factory Method pattern used to resolve dependencies. This implementation allows only a single instance to be created, cached, and reused. The singleton instance is the result a value passed as a constructor parameter.

member.returns: An IDependencyResolution instance.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AspectDynamicInvoker class.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.SoC.AspectDynamicInvoker.Invoke(System.Type,System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object,System.Object[])
member.summary: Represnts a dynamic invocation of a proxied type member.
member.param: The run-time type of the proxied type (may differ from MethodInfo.DeclaringType).
The MethodInfo of the invoked member.
The proxy object instance.
The parameters passed to the invoked member, if appliable.
member.returns: The return value from the invoked member, if appliable.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.SoC.AspectDynamicInvoker.OnInterceptAfterInvoke(System.Boolean,System.Type,System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Object@,System.Exception@)
member.summary: This method is executed after the invoking the intercepted member on the intercepted instance. NOTE: The intercepted member can be accessed via the InterceptedInstance property. Do not confuse the intercepted member for the target instance. The target instance is the underlying proxy object.
member.param: A value indicating whether the invocation of the member preceeded this interception point.
The runtime type of the invoking instance (may differ from MethodInfo.DeclaringType).
The MethodInfo that was to be invoked.
The target object instance of the invocation.
The parameters passed to the invoked member, if appliable.
The return value from the invoked member, if appliable.

The exception thrown from the invoked member or null if no error (as input); an exception to rethrow or null (as output). The implementation can choose to swallow a thrown exception or project an exception where none was thrown at the taret invocation.
member.returns: A value indicating whether to proceed with the invoking the member.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.SoC.AspectDynamicInvoker.OnInterceptBeforeInvoke(System.Boolean@,System.Type,System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object,System.Object[])
member.summary: This method is executed before the invoking the intercepted member on the intercepted instance. NOTE: The intercepted member can be accessed via the InterceptedInstance property. Do not confuse the intercepted member for the target instance. The target instance is the underlying proxy object.
member.param: A value indicating whether to proceed with the invoking the member.
The runtime type of the invoking instance (may differ from MethodInfo.DeclaringType).
The MethodInfo to invoke.
The target object instance of the invocation.
The parameters passed to the invoked member, if appliable.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.SoC.AspectDynamicInvoker.OnInterceptProceedInvoke(System.Type,System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object,System.Object[])
member.summary: This method is executes the the intercepted member on the intercepted instance. NOTE: The intercepted member can be accessed via the InterceptedInstance property. Do not confuse the intercepted member for the target instance. The target instance is the underlying proxy object. Generally, inheritors will use the default implementation of this method but advanced scenarios can override this method ensuring a base call.
member.param: The run-time type of the proxied type (may differ from MethodInfo.DeclaringType).
The MethodInfo of the invoked member.
The proxy object instance.
The parameters passed to the invoked member, if appliable.
member.returns: The return value from the invoked member, if appliable.

member.name: P:LeastViable.Solder.SoC.AspectDynamicInvoker.InterceptedInstance
member.summary: Gets the intercepted instance.

member.name: T:LeastViable.Solder.SoC.ProxyFactory`1
member.summary: Acts as an abstract factory for proxy objects, with cache support. Uses reader-writer lock for asynchronous protection (i.e. thread-safety). Provides agregated disposal of all cached proxies in the cache by calling Dispose() (if IDisposable).
member.typeparam: The type of the cache trait.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.SoC.ProxyFactory`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ProxyFactory`1 class.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.SoC.ProxyFactory`1.DisposeOf(System.Object)
member.summary: Disposes of the inner proxies, if present. Once disposed, the instance cannot be reused.
member.param: The proxy to dispose of.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.SoC.ProxyFactory`1.CreateOrGetInstance``1(System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.Type,`0},System.Func{``0})
member.summary: Returns an instance of the specified proxy type for the given key-value pair for a type and cache trait. If the instance is in the cache, it will be returned; otherwise a new instacne is created, added to the cache, and returned. This method is thread-safe: a reader-writer-lock is used to serialize access in the case of a new addition to the cahce.
member.typeparam: The type of proxy object to return.
member.param: The cahce trait used to check cache existence.

A callback is specified to provide a factory method mechanism. This allows inheritors the abillity to customize the object being created. This method is only called if a new object is required; i.e. the object does not exist in the cache with the specified type and cahce trait.
member.returns: An instance of the specified proxy type.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.SoC.ProxyFactory`1.Dispose
member.summary: Notifies any registered listeners to the DisposeInstances event to dispose then clears the internal cache. Once disposed, the instance cannot be reused.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.SoC.ProxyFactory`1.IsInstanceInCache(System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.Type,`0})
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether an object of a type exists in the cache with the specified cache trait.
member.param: A key-value pair object representing the cache trait for a given type.
member.returns: True if an object exists in the cache with the given cache trait for the typr; otherwise false.

member.name: P:LeastViable.Solder.SoC.ProxyFactory`1.Disposed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current instance has been disposed.

member.summary: Provides a (remoting) real proxy for objects which leverage the dynamic invoker infrastructure (i.e. IDynamicInvocation).
member.typeparam: The type of the transparent proxy object served up by this class.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.SoC.RemotingImpl.DynamicInvokerRealProxy`1.#ctor(LeastViable.Solder.SoC.IDynamicInvocation)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DynamicInvokerRealProxy`1 class.
member.param: The dynamic invoker object to use.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.SoC.RemotingImpl.DynamicInvokerRealProxy`1.CanCastTo(System.Type,System.Object)
member.summary: Checks whether the proxy that represents the specified object type can be cast to the type represented by the IRemotingTypeInfo interface.
member.returns: true if cast will succeed; otherwise, false.
member.param: The type to cast to.
The object for which to check casting.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Solder.SoC.RemotingImpl.DynamicInvokerRealProxy`1.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes of the inner dynamic invoker. Once disposed, the instance cannot be reused.

member.summary: Runtime real proxy invocation.

member.returns: Invocation return message.
